TopicTitle: Post the most useless website you've found

Articles.Content:
Here's a fun thread where you can post a link to the most useless website you've ever come across. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) (please keep it somewhat appropriate)

I'll try to update this post with all sites found, under filters. (IE useless game, useless site, funny, static)

I'll start us off with [www.wwwdotcom.com](www.wwwdotcom.com) ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-13T14:42:28Z" title="05/13/2015 02:42  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 13, 2015</time> by Endersmens**

I won't be able to check all these till I get home, but I'll add them to the main post so other people can waste time on the interwebz too. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Sal that's the best thing I've seen in weeks ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) :D

> 
> [This](http://www.nooooooooooooooo.com/) one?

When I first found that one last year, it played it over and over and laughed the whole time. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

That reminds me, [www.eeyup.com](www.eeyup.com)
it wasnt meant to be mean sorry

I was joking. Notice the ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) in parentheses. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I think I'm actually gonna add that as the most useless website, since its a website full of useless website. Just like [www.theuselessweb.com](www.theuselessweb.com)

> 
> Bleh, stupid school blockers...

I feel ya. I have to post mine hoping I got the Address right cause I can't check thanks to school internet.
